changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Make the banner for Kenya and deactivate CI organizations

changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Add counties and districts to the organizations

changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Associates new and existing sample types with new and existing panels

changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Add localization for english and french per test

changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Point the dictionary category id from Kenya Lab
changeSet.sql: UPDATE clinlims.dictionary SET dictionary_category_id = (SELECT id FROM clinlims.dictionary_category WHERE description = 'Kenya Lab') WHERE display_key like 'dictionary.result%';

changeSet.author: jfurlong
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.test_result set significant_digits = 1 where test_id in (select id from clinlims.test where description in ('Lymphocyte, Absolute(Blood)','Monocyte, Absolute(Blood)','Eosinophil, Absolute(Blood)','Basophil, Absolute(Blood)','Neutrophil, Absolute(Blood)','RBC Count - Male(Blood)','RBC Count - Female(Blood)','Hemoglobin - Male(Blood)','Hemoglobin - Female(Blood)','Hematocrit - Male(Blood)','Hematocrit - Female(Blood)','RDW(Blood)','PCT(Blood)'));
